Event.name: Business_closure
Event.definition:
<def-root>A business locale, the <fen>Entity</fen>, ceases to provide services and closes.
<ex><fex name="ent">Exxon</fex> <t>went under</t>.</ex></def-root>

Arg.name: Entity
Arg.definition:
<def-root>The <fen>Entity</fen> is rendered unable to continue its regular operations.
<ex><fex name="ent">The local McDonalds</fex> <t>shut down</t> <fex name="Time">in 2008</fex> <fex name="Explanation">because the owner passed away and no one would set up to the plate</fex>.</ex></def-root>

Arg.name: Explanation
Arg.definition:
<def-root>The <fen>Explanation</fen> is named as one of the causes of failure.
<ex><fex name="ent">The local McDonalds</fex> <t>shut down</t> in 2008 <fex name="exp">because the owner died</fex>.</ex></def-root>

Arg.name: Time
Arg.definition:
<def-root>The <fen>Time</fen> of the failure.
<ex><fex name="ent">The local McDonalds</fex> <t>shut down</t> <fex name="tim">in 2008 </fex> because the owner died.</ex></def-root>

Arg.name: Place
Arg.definition:
<def-root>The <fen>Place</fen> of the failing entity.
<ex><fex name="ent">Every Ikea</fex> <t>shut down</t> <fex name="pla">in Ohio</fex> <fex name="tim">last week</fex>.</ex></def-root>

Arg.name: Circumstances
Arg.definition:
<def-root>The <fen>Circumstances</fen> that caused failure. Compared to <fen>Explanation</fen>, this describes situations or environments that lead to failure, not a specific reason for failure.
<ex><fex name="ent">Shops</fex> often <t>close down</t> <fex name="cir">amid political or economic turmoil</fex>.</ex></def-root>

Arg.name: Manner
Arg.definition:
<def-root>The <fen>Manner</fen> describes the way in which the <fen>Entity</fen> failed.
<ex><fex name="cir">When the housing bubble burst</fex>, <fex name="ent">his real estate chain</fex> <fex name="man">abruptly</fex> <t>closed down</t>.</ex></def-root>

Arg.name: Containing_event
Arg.definition:
<def-root>The <fen>Containing_event</fen> is an event within which the failure occurs.
<ex><fex name="ent">Businesses</fex> <fex name="pla">in the Congo</fex> <t>failed</t> <fex name="Containing_event">during their civil war</fex>.</ex></def-root>

Arg.name: Depictive
Arg.definition:
<def-root>A <fen>Depictive</fen> describes something about the <fen>Entity</fen>.
<ex><fex name="ent">The business</fex>, <fex name="dep">unable to maintain appeal in the E.U.</fex>, <t>closed its doors</t> <fex name="tim">in 2003</fex>.</ex></def-root>

lexUnit.name: close its doors.v
lexUnit.definition: FN:A business location (or multiple locations) are closed permanently.

lexUnit.name: close down.v
lexUnit.definition: FN: An Entity closes its physical locales and ceases operation.
